title: Raven's Quest
description: Epic fantasy romance from the New York Times bestselling author of the Elemental Witch quartet.Branna ta Cattia is the Raven, a high priestess who has come to Numia to defeat its tyrant. It's a journey made on the strength of her prophetic dreams, visions of ancient rituals, sacred spells, and of a handsome stranger destined to help her.
author: Anya Bast
